extendedInfo.description: Tilt Mazes 2Droid is a puzzle game. Include several game modes, level editor, Scoreloop online scores and much more. The goal of the game is to collect all the target squares from the initial position of the ball.When the ball moves in one direction, will not stop until it reach an obstacle.The movement of the ball can be done by gestures on the board or the directional pad.TiltMazes has 4 game modes:- Campaign: The campaign mode consists of 26 predefined mazes. You can play them in any order you like.- Random Game: Random mode provides the Tilt Mazes 2Droid of unlimited duration. Every time you start a game in this mode, the application displays a randomly generated labyrinth.- Saved Mazes: You can also play mazes previously created by users through the built-in level editor.It also includes a level editor that allows the user creates, save and play your own puzzles.- Community Mazes: All players will play the boards posted by other players.Thanks to the random mode and level editor Tilt Mazes 2Droid will present a different challenge in each game.Besides, you can choose the theme of the maze from: Classic, Wood and Metal, Golf and Random. Or if you prefer, custom colors for all labyrinth elements.If you like brain games and puzzle games like Dots, Flow, Jewels, Cut the Rope, 100 Doors, Can You Escape, Tetris or Where's my Water? Tilt Mazes 2Droid it's your game.Finally, remember that if you like Tilt Mazes 2Droid you can rate the application in Google Play.
